fr.polytech.projectjava.utils.jfx

Class ApplicationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • fr.polytech.projectjava.utils.jfx.ApplicationBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainApplication, SimulationApplication

    public abstract class ApplicationBase
extends javafx.application.Application
    Basic scheme for a JavaFX application.

    Created by Thomas Couchoud (MrCraftCod - zerderr@gmail.com) on 28/03/2017.

    2017-03-28
